original_text: The Lord has brought it about, and has done as he said. Because you sinned against the Lord and did not obey his voice, this thing has come upon you.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그가 말씀하신 대로 행하셨으니 이는 너희가 여호와께 범죄하고 그의 목소리에 순종하지 아니하였으므로 이제 이루어졌도다 이 일이 너희에게 임한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord has brought it about
and has done as he said
Because you sinned against the Lord
and did not obey his voice
this thing has come upon you
